text: Jesse Pinkman is a character from the TV series Breaking Bad. He also has a minor appearance in the spinoff series Better Call Saul. Jesse is a drug dealer who used to be in Walter "Walt" White's chemistry class when he was in high school. After Walt learns he has cancer, he becomes partners with Jesse to cook meth and make money. title: Jesse Pinkman
